li.label: Ork Mind
li.description: This is an Ork. The warp may impact this being, but it's more likely that the Ork won't even take notice.

li.label: Automaton Mind
li.description: This is an automaton. While the warp may have effects on everything, this entity is not concerned with religions.

li.label: cultural memory
li.description: The gods of NAME have been destroyed long ago. They are still remembered and revered, but no longer worshipped, for they won't answer.

li.label: atheist
li.description: NAME does not believe in divinity. There are no gods among the stars, only cruel and powerful forces.

li.label: agnostic
li.description: NAME holds that one cannot encompass the divine, therefore worshipping gods is a fallacy.

li.label: religious
li.description: NAME believes in gods, worshipping them with moderate devotion.

li.label: fervent believer
li.description: NAME strongly believes in the divine.

li.label: fanatic
li.description: NAME dedicates HIS life to the divine and will go to war for HIS believes.
